solution_line_template: Emma had ${initial_balance} - ${withdrawal_amount} = $<<{initial_balance}-{withdrawal_amount}={balance_after_withdrawal}>>{balance_after_withdrawal} left in her bank account after she withdrew ${withdrawal_amount}.
The next week, she deposited ${withdrawal_amount} x {deposit_multiplier} = $<<{withdrawal_amount}*{deposit_multiplier}={deposit_amount}>>{deposit_amount}.
Hence, she now has a total of ${balance_after_withdrawal} + ${deposit_amount} = $<<{balance_after_withdrawal}+{deposit_amount}={final_balance}>>{final_balance} in her bank account.
